description: A versatile agent for handling various development tasks including bug fixes, feature implementation, and code refactoring.
---

# General Purpose Agent

This agent is designed to handle a wide variety of development tasks for the Haman repository.

## Capabilities
- Bug fixes and issue resolution
- Feature implementation
- Code refactoring and optimization
- Documentation updates
- Test creation and maintenance

## Guidelines
- Always follow the repository's coding standards
- Write clean, maintainable code
- Include appropriate tests for new features
- Update documentation as needed
- Keep changes focused and minimal
